      • TitledItem

        public TitledItem()
        Creates an Item with no component and no title.

      • TitledItem

        public TitledItem(C component,
                  java.lang.String title)
        Creates an Item with the given component and title.
        Parameters:
        component - the component displayed by this Item
        title - the title displayed to the left of the component

    • Method Detail

      • setComponent

        public void setComponent(C component)
        Sets the JComponent contained by this Item. If a title has been assigned to this object then it will appear to the left of the JComponent.
        Overrides:
        setComponent in class Item<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
        Parameters:
        component - a JComponent that this Item contains

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets a title to be displayed next to the item by assigning the given String to the name field and setting hasTitle to true. Note that this title will only appear if setComponent() is called.
        Parameters:
        title - a String containing the title to be displayed next to this Item

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns the title to be displayed next to the item by returning the name field.
        Returns:
        a String containing the title to be displayed next to this Item

      • hasTitle

        public boolean hasTitle()
        Indicates whether or not this object has a title by returning !(title == null)
        Returns:
        a String containing the title to be displayed next to this Item

      • getTitleLabel

        public javax.swing.JLabel getTitleLabel()
        Returns the JLabel containing the title to be displayed next to this Item
        Returns:
        a JLabel containing the title to be displayed next to this Item

      • isEnabled

        public void isEnabled(java.lang.Boolean isEnabled)
        Description copied from class: Item
        Enables or disables the JComponent held by this Item.
        Overrides:
        isEnabled in class Item<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - enables the JComponent held by this Item when set to true and disables it when set to false.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int width,
                    int height)
        Description copied from class: Item
        Overrides the Element method to compensate for differences between the desired size of components and the size of the whole Item. The given parameters refer to the desired size of components and not to the size of this Item, which will be slightly bigger, depending on the setting for spacing on the parent BorderPanel.
        Overrides:
        setSize in class Item<C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
        Parameters:
        width - the int representing width of the component
        height - the int representing height of the component

      • resize

        public void resize()
        Adjusts the size of this Item following any changes that have been made to the components, such as a change of title or display.
